Label: INCLUSION CRITERIA #1
Description: 1. Subject is methamphetamine experienced but not dependent, aged 18 to 45 years.

Label: INCLUSION CRITERIA #3
Description: 3. Willing and able to give written consent.

Label: INCLUSION CRITERIA #4
Description: 4. Not in the follow-up period of a preceding drug research study.

Label: INCLUSION CRITERIA #5
Description: 5. No medical contraindications from the medical history, physical examination including vital signs, 12-lead ECG, hematology, blood chemistry and urinalysis.

Label: INCLUSION CRITERIA #6
Description: 6. Use of an acceptable method of birth control.

Label: INCLUSION CRITERIA #7
Description: 7. Negative drug test (barbiturates, benzodiazepines, amphetamines, opiates, cocaine and ethanol).

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #1
Description: 9. History of hematological, hepatic, respiratory, cardiovascular, renal or CNS disease or any other medical condition that is capable of altering  the metabolism or elimination of drugs or of constituting a risk factor when taking the study drug.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #2
Description: 10. Recent history of methamphetamine or other drug addiction and/or alcoholism.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #3
Description: 11. Any medical condition that could relapse during or immediately after the study, and in the investigator’s opinion, interferes with study evaluations or affects a subject’s safety.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #4
Description: 12. Significant acute or chronic medical disease.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #5
Description: 13. On standard 12-lead ECG, a QTc interval >440 msec for males or >450 msec for females

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #6
Description: 14. Likely to need concomitant treatment medication during the study period.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #7
Description: 15. Blood donation during the 30 days preceding study entry.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #8
Description: 16. Tobacco smoker or non-smoker for less than 3 months; i.e., a recent change in smoking status.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #9
Description: 17. Alcohol consumption averaging > 40 g daily during the past 30 days.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #10
Description: 18. Coffee (or tea) consumption > 6 cups (6 x 0.24 L) per day or xanthine containing drinks > 1 liter/day (e.g. cola drinks, etc.).

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #11
Description: 19. No adequate means of contaacting the investigator in case of emergency or not able to be contacted readily by the invesigator.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #12
Description: 20. Female who is pregnant, lactating or plans to become pregnant during the study period and within one month after study drug administration.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #13
Description: 21. Exposure to any investigational new drug within 30 days of screening.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #14
Description: 22. Regular use of any prescription or over-the-counter drugs.

Label: EXCLUSION CRITERIA #15
Description: 23. Use of any herbal products likely to induce or inhibit hepatic microsomal enzyme CYP 2D6 within one month of the start of the study, including St. John’s wort (Hypericum perforatum).

Label: ELIGIBLE FOR STUDY PARTICIPATION
Description: 24. Is the subject eligible for study participation?

Label: WAS SUBJECT TERMINATED EARLY
Description: Was subject terminated early from the trial?

Label: SUBJECT COMPLETED STUDY
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject completed study.

Label: SUBJECT INELIGIBLE
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject was determined after enrollment to be ineligible. (Provide comments)

Label: SUBJECT REQUESTED TO WITHDRAW
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject requested to withdraw. (Provide comments)

Label: SUBJECT TERMINATED FOR MEDICAL REASONS
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject experienced intercurrent illness, unrelated medical condition, or clinically significant adverse events which, in the judgment of the investigator, promped early termination. (If subject experienced adverse event(s), an Adverse Event Case Report Form(s) must be completed.) (Provide comments.)

Label: SUBJECT TERMINATED FOR ADMIN REASONS
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject terminated for administrative reasons. Include protocol non-compliance in this category.  (Provide Comments)

Label: SUBJECT WAS INCARCERATED
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject was incarcerated.

Label: SUBJECT BECAME PREGNANT
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject became pregnant.

Label: SUBJECT DEVELOPED SENSITIVITY
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject developed sensitivity to study agent.

Label: SUBJECT WAS LOST TO FOLLOW-UP
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject was lost to follow-up.

Label: SUBJECT MOVED FROM AREA
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject moved from area.

Label: SUBJECT DIED
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject died.

Label: SUBJECT NO LONGER ATTENDS LAB
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject no longer attends lab.

Label: SUBJECT IS IN CONTROLLED ENVIRONMENT
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject is in a controlled environment.

Label: SUBJECT IS A SCREEN FAILURE
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Subject is a screen failure.

Label: OTHER
Description: Reason subject's participation has ended (mark all that apply): Other (Provide comments)
